body.name: Viniper 6 inch Rechargeable Clip on Fan, 5000mah Battery Desk Fan : 360° Rotation & 3 Speeds Strong Wind Portable Fan, 8-30 Working Hours, Quiet and Powerful (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 18 mins
features: 【 Longer Working Hours, Rechargeable USB Powered 】The rechargeable clip on fan operates with 5000mAh and can operate for about 8 - 30 hours after a full charge. At the same time, the viniper updated version clip fan have longer working hours. It can also be used via USB port from your PC/computer/USB charger or other USB devices.
【Stable Clamping & 360°Rotation】The Viniper Clip on fan has a strong and stable wind that keeps you cool. not disturbing your rest and work. The Battery desk fan has 360 degree adjustable rotation.

【3-stage adjustable wind speed & Quietness】 Small but poweful. 3-stage easily adjustable wind speed. The speed of this portable desk battery fan can also be adjusted among low, medium, and high according to your demands. it is decent and quiet which ensure the peaceful flow of air, and enough for personal use.

【Safe & Portable】Used high-quality ABS and Brushless copper motor. It has stable performance and long operating life. And It is trouble-free to put this small ( 7.2*6.1*2.4 inch, weight- 10.5 ounces) and the exquisite battery fan into your bag and carry it for outdoor events. Also, it can be used for indoor use. Ideal suitable for office, family, dormitory, library use and etc.

【Package Content & Customer Service】You get one Viniper Portable Clip on Desk Fan, one USB cable, one user guide, Please write amazon email to us for help if meeting any problem. We will respond within 24-hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars really powerful and quiet
reviews.reviewText: Very nice fan. The clip is strong! It's almost difficult to open due to its strength (and my lack of hand strength) point being, it stays where you clip it. The flow of air is strong and easily adjustable. Its quiet. Three strong speeds at the click of a button on the back. I havent had it long enough to comment on battery life, but with a 5000mah I expect long operation on a single charge.I bought this as a gift for my friend's vintage car which lacks a climate control system. It clips strongly to the dash and provides great airflow. The noise is very much like a normal car system, so no distraction from noise. LED lights indicate speed and charge status. It is better and quieter than a plug-in fan of similar size. I can imagine dozens of applications for this little gem; Travel, camping, office, gym, car, yoga class, school, just to name a few. It does stand and operate on its own base, so you dont have to clip it to a flat surface. It is highly adjustable and works well at every angle. It is attractive and easy to use. I bought navy blue and its nice. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little rechargeable fan.
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a little fan in my bathroom window but we didn't have a receptacle near by so I ordered this little fan and it works great, 3 speeds, very quiet, rechargeable. I would definitely order another one. So far no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works really well! 💨🍃
reviews.reviewText: Bigger than most tiny fans but not too big. Good speed settings, can really move some air! We use it 24/7 to provide light air flow for a picky tamarind tree. The clip is secure and I like the longer cord.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Powerful little fan!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this fan for my son. He sleeps on the bottom bunk of his bunk bed and can't feel the ceiling fan. I wanted to buy him a fan that would give a subtle breeze because too much air tends to gets his allergies going. I charge it for several hours during the day and even use it for myself while it's charging. This fan works very well and I love it! My sin is also happy with it too. I try to keep it in medium speed so he was feel it and would last most of the night. I don't know how long it last because by the the time he wakes up the battery has already died. I know it does last most of the night because I go to bed very late and it's still running when I check on him. Overall I am very happy with the fan and I think I will purchase another one for my other child. However, I think I will get a corded one so I will know for sure they are being cooled the whole night. Removed a star because the clip is not very secure on the pole of his bed and therefore I have to clip it to the ladder to ensure it won't slide down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These little fans throw a good bit of air. Got two of them for camping and the battery lasts several hours on high and lasts all night on medium. On low lasts all night and all the next day. Great purchase and I will buy again if these die.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow, fantastic battery powered fan!
reviews.reviewText: Wow, I am literally blown away by this fan! I needed it for a blazing hot outdoor July 4th Concert I was performing in. Amazon got it to me in time and it way exceeded my expectations. I have used clip on electric fans before (that have worked great!), but there was no way to hook up to electricity at this concert… and I had low expectations for a battery powered fan. Amazingly, it easily clipped to any part of my music stand, or anywhere else I would want to put it. The adjustability was mind-blowing…. it easily could be aimed in any direction, at any angle… and it had all the nonstop power I needed. Super lightweight and quiet. It never slowed and easily made it through both the sound check and the performance. By the end of the concert, my colleagues were coming up to me… so impressed never having seen a fan like this! So I ended up sharing the Amazon link, and people were buying it on the spot, right there onstage. If you even think you would like a fan like this, I promise you, this one is Fantastic, and so reasonably priced… get it, you will be so glad you did!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bought the second..bad idea
reviews.reviewText: I really liked the first oneI bought. So when my daughter had ACL surgery, I let her borrow mine and she ended up loving it, so I just decided to buy another.. this second one won’t stay charged.. now it won’t charge at all. I thought maybe it was the charging cord so I used the one my daughter has been using (every night) and mine won’t even charge. I had plans on buying more ..but nope.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome fan for RVers
reviews.reviewText: This fan is small but mighty! The battery lasts a surprisingly long time, and it has 3 speed options which is great! The hook and clip on the stand give a lot of options for placement in the rv bedroom. We also use it to help circulate air and dry the dishes!
Muy práctico y le dura bastante la batería, si duda una muy buena compra.

There are Pros & Cons for this fan. Pro: whisper quiet, battery is long lasting. I timed every time I used it, and it lasted 24hrs on medium speed. The only con is, the USB cable is only 16ins. I have a desktop, & I can't charge while it's on my monitor. Like I said it's a good little fan. Powerful & Quiet
These are great little fans. My wife has 3 of them. Great for her gym equipment or her desk. Nice and quiet and runs a long time on a full charge. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works for 5.5hrs on full speed, 7.5hrs on medium. Don’t know about low because I haven’t tried it. It can also be run whilst plugged in. It is quiet for a fan but you are never going to get a silent one. Very strong clip.

reviews.reviewTitle: It’s perfect for my work desk
reviews.reviewText: I work in an office that has south facing windows, and is always stifling. I purchased this for my desk, and it’s perfect, it doesn’t take up too much space, easy to charge. I definitely recommend this little guy.
